title: Microbiology
description: Basic biology of bacteria, fungi, algae, and viruses, with emphasis on bacteriology
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ((BIOS 1107 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOS 1107L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or (BIOS 1207 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOS 1207L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or BIOL 1510 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 1511 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and CHEM 1212K Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
